list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: turn project skeleton into fully testable user management system
- implement full user CRUD API using FastAPI - add PostgreSQL persistence with SQLAlchemy ORM - enforce data integrity via unique email constraint - introduce deterministic API tests with database reset per test - add health endpoint and explicit readiness waiting for stable test execution - provide minimal web UI only for critical UI test coverage - dockerize app, tests and database for identical local and CI execution - fix missing runtime dependency required for EmailStr validation
